munchlax.lib.message module¶

class munchlax.lib.message.Message(slack, message)[source]¶

Bases: munchlax.lib.object.Object

delete()[source]¶

Deletes the message.

Raise:
SlackError: Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
edit(text, **kwargs)[source]¶

Updates the message’s contents.

Parameters:
  • text (str) – The new message contents.
  • **kwargs – Additional options to use when updating the message. Refer to Slack#raw_edit for more information.
Raises:

SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
get_author()[source]¶
get_channel()[source]¶
get_replies()[source]¶
reply(text, **kwargs)[source]¶

Writes a reply to the message.

This is basically a convenience function for:

` slack.raw_write(text=text, channel=message.channel) `

Parameters:
  • text (str) – The text of the message.
  • Additional options to use when sending the (**kwargs;) –

    message. Refer to Slack#raw_write for more information.

    In most cases, you will only need to specify text if you only want to send a text message.
Returns:

A Message object representing the newly sent message.
Return type:

Message
Raise:
SlackError: Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
